mapper.select: select gmjcboardno, gmjcboardtitle,gmjcboarddesc,gmjusername,gmjcboard.credat,gmjcboardcnt from gmjcboard,gmjclient where gmjcboard.gmjclientno=gmjclient.gmjUserNo order by gmjcboard.credat, gmjcboardno;

select gmjcboardno, gmjcboardtitle,gmjusername,date_format(gmjcboard.credat,"%Y-%m-%d") as credat,gmjcboardcnt from gmjcboard,gmjclient where gmjcboard.gmjclientno=gmjclient.gmjUserNo order by gmjcboard.credat desc, gmjcboardno desc limit #{bundle} OFFSET #{OFFSET}

select gmjcboard.gmjcboardno,gmjcboard.gmjcboarddesc,gmjcboard.gmjcboardtitle,gmjclient.gmjusername,date_format(gmjcboard.credat,"%Y-%m-%d") as credat, gmjcboard.gmjcboardcnt, gmjupload.gmjuploadaddress from gmjcboard,gmjclient,gmjupload where gmjcboard.gmjcboardno=#{gmjcboardno} and gmjcboard.gmjclientno=gmjclient.gmjUserNo and gmjupload.gmjcboardno=gmjcboard.gmjcboardno

select gmjcboard.gmjcboardno,gmjcboard.gmjcboarddesc,gmjcboard.gmjcboardtitle,gmjclient.gmjusername,date_format(gmjcboard.credat,"%Y-%m-%d") as credat, gmjcboard.gmjcboardcnt from gmjcboard,gmjclient where gmjcboard.gmjcboardno=#{gmjcboardno} and gmjcboard.gmjclientno=gmjclient.gmjUserNo
select * from gmjcboard where gmjcboardno order by gmjcboardno desc limit 1;
mapper.update: update gmjcboard set gmjcboardcnt=gmjcboardcnt+1 where gmjcboardno=#{gmjcboardno};
mapper.select: select distinct gmjreply.*,gmjclient.gmjUserName from gmjreply,gmjclient,gmjcboard where gmjreply.gmjcboardno=#{gmjcboardno} and gmjreply.gmjuserno=gmjclient.gmjuserno;
select distinct gmjreply.*,gmjclient.gmjUserName from gmjreply,gmjclient where gmjreply.gmjuserno=gmjclient.gmjuserno;
